Key Match Events: India won the match by 71 runs
Zimbabwe were bowled out for 115 in 17.2 overs
Pre-Game Insights: India will top Group 2 if they beat Zimbabwe
India are already through to the semi-finals
Zimbabwe might be all but out of the tournament following their defeat to Netherlands
Post-Match Reflections: India sealed their place at the top of Group 2 and set-up a semi-final showdown against England
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's average opening stand is 13 at a run rate of 4.27
Regis Chakabva has struggled in this T20 World Cup, scoring only 45 runs at an average of 6.42 and a strike rate of 77.58
Others: The match was played at the Melbourne Cricket Ground (MCG)
The pitch was fresh and expected to provide help for seamers
